page.content: {Pasties {Pasties}are a{traditional Cornish dish.They first originated when the Cornish tin miners wanted something to take down the mines and eat.In it they had{potato,beef,swede,parsly}and {onion}(not carrot or egg)in one side,and in the other side the dessert,usually{jam}and{cream}or{apple {pie}and{cream.}It is said that if a real pasty is dropped down a mine shaft it would still be intact when it reached the bottom.Before the woman made the pasty she made sure her hands were cold,this is supposed to make the pastry stick better.PASTY RECIPE: Make sure hands are{cold. 1\lb short pastry.{1\ lb}skirt beef. {2 onions.{10}potatoes.{Half}a turnip. Salt & pepper. Makes{2 large}and {3 small pasties.
